$MVIS MM’s have stuck to their plan shorting all Lidar sector stocks until clear leaders pull away.  Even if one rips they still win on the majority.  

If bears are right and microvision isn’t in IVAS/AR/VR then we are still priced at the bottom of the Lidar sector which sits between 800m - 1B.  If the bears are wrong and we are in IVAS (highly doubt display engines can be switched on the fly during ongoing testing) while still receiving royalties from the $MSFT contract (hololens2) then that’s not even priced in at these valuations.

This could set up for a massive squeeze if any unknowns are answered.

Unknowns: mass adoption of AR/VR, IVAS, LIDAR (newly introduced consortium)

The connections are there, it’s just who will light the match first.
